description.p: Some DMs may grant a free feat for your characters at level 1. Check this if your DM does it.
You are proficient in the use of Yo-Yos as a weapon. You can add your proficiency modifier to the attack roll, and don't need to reel them in after attacking.

description.p: You are proficient in the use of Exotic weapons, not normally used by your typical fighter, or weapons that come from strange lands. You can add your proficiency modifier to the attack roll of said weapons.
